description: Dashboard to get an overview of one server

targets.expr: sum by (instance) (irate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{group=~"$NodeGroup:*", instance=~"$hosts:*"}[5m])) + sum by (instance) (irate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{group=~"$NodeGroup:*", instance=~"$hosts:*"}[5m]))

title: DBL-Node-Monitor
